con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value="XML"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Slack Channel(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> <con:entry key="Test Suite Tags" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value="JUnit-Style report for automation"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Test Suite" value="SmokeCompanyEmployeeTestSuite"/> <con:entry key="Run in-process" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Test Case Tags" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results with test properties" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Test Case" value="<all>"/> <con:entry key="Slack Access Token" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value="C:\Program Files\SmartBear\ReadyAPI-2.8.2\bin"/> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default environment"/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value="${WORKSPACE}"/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> </xml-fragment>

con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://csssr.com/definitions" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:schema="http://csssr.com/schemas" xmlns:tns="http://csssr.com/definitions"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://csssr.com/schemas" schemaLocation="testSchema.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="AddCompanyRequest"> <wsdl:part name="AddCompanyRequest" element="schema:AddCompanyRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AddCompanyResponse"> <wsdl:part name="AddCompanyResponse" element="schema:AddCompanyResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetCompanyRequest"> <wsdl:part name="GetCompanyRequest" element="schema:GetCompanyRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetCompanyResponse"> <wsdl:part name="GetCompanyResponse" element="schema:GetCompanyResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AddEmployeeRequest"> <wsdl:part name="AddEmployeeRequest" element="schema:AddEmployeeRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AddEmployeeResponse"> <wsdl:part name="AddEmployeeResponse" element="schema:AddEmployeeResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AddEmployeesToCompanyRequest"> <wsdl:part name="AddEmployeesToCompanyRequest" element="schema:AddEmployeesToCompanyRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AddEmployeesToCompanyResponse"> <wsdl:part name="AddEmployeesToCompanyResponse" element="schema:AddEmployeesToCompanyResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="UpdateEmployeeRequest"> <wsdl:part name="UpdateEmployeeRequest" element="schema:UpdateEmployeeRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="UpdateEmployeeResponse"> <wsdl:part name="UploadEmployeeResponse" element="schema:UpdateEmployeeResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CompanyResource"> <wsdl:operation name="AddCompany"> <wsdl:input message="tns:AddCompanyRequest" name="AddCompanyRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AddCompanyResponse" name="AddCompanyResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetCompany"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetCompanyRequest" name="GetCompanyRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetCompanyResponse" name="GetCompanyResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="AddEmployee"> <wsdl:input message="tns:AddEmployeeRequest" name="AddEmployeeRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AddEmployeeResponse" name="AddEmployeeResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="AddEmployeesToCompany"> <wsdl:input message="tns:AddEmployeesToCompanyRequest" name="AddEmployeesToCompanyRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AddEmployeesToCompanyResponse" name="AddEmployeesToCompanyResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="UpdateEmployee"> <wsdl:input message="tns:UpdateEmployeeRequest" name="UpdateEmployeeRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:UpdateEmployeeResponse" name="UpdateEmployeeResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CompanyResourceBinding" type="tns:CompanyResource"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="AddCompany"> <wsdl:input name="AddCompanyRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetCompany"> <wsdl:input name="GetCompanyRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="AddEmployee"> <wsdl:input name="AddEmployeeRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="AddEmployeesToCompany"> <wsdl:input name="AddEmployeesToCompanyRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="UpdateEmployee"> <wsdl:input name="UpdateEmployeeRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CompanyResourceService"> <wsdl:port name="CompanyResourcePort" binding="tns:CompanyResourceBinding"> <soap:address location="https://soap.qa-test.csssr.com/ws/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://csssr.com/schemas" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:csssr="http://csssr.com/schemas"> <xs:element name="AddCompanyRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AddCompanyResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Company" type="csssr:CompanyType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetCompanyRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CompanyId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetCompanyResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Company" type="csssr:CompanyType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AddEmployeeRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="FirstName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="LastName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="MiddleName" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AddEmployeeResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Employee" type="csssr:EmployeeType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AddEmployeesToCompanyRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CompanyId" type="csssr:EntityId"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="EmployeeId" type="csssr:EntityId"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AddEmployeesToCompanyResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Company" type="csssr:CompanyType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="UpdateEmployeeRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Id" type="csssr:EntityId"/> <xs:element name="FirstName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="LastName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="MiddleName" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="UpdateEmployeeResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Employee" type="csssr:EmployeeType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="EmployeeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="CreatedAt" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="UpdatedAt" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="FirstName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="LastName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="MiddleName" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CompanyType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="CreatedAt" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="UpdatedAt" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="employees" type="csssr:EmployeeType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="EntityId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

con:testCase.name: AddEmployee TestCase
con:testCase.con:setupScript: import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils charset = (('а'..'я') + ('А'..'Я') + ('0'..'9')).join() length = 9 context.FirstName = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) context.MiddleName = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) context.LastName = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray())

con:testCase.name: AddEmployeesToCompany TestCase
GetCompany TestCase
UpdateEmployee TestCase
con:testCase.con:setupScript:
import org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils
class Employee { def id } def idList = ["5f7d9dca8b534700011ef034", "5f7d9f02cce19d0001e866c6", "5f7d9f098b534700011ef03a", "5f7d9f10cce19d0001e866c7", "5f7d9f158b534700011ef03b", "5f7d9f1dcce19d0001e866c8", "5f7d9f258b534700011ef03c", "5f7d9f2dcce19d0001e866c9", "5f7d9f388b534700011ef03d", "5f7d9f41cce19d0001e866ca"] 10.times { Collections.shuffle idList Employee employee = new Employee ( id : idList.first() ) context.EmployeeId = employee.id } charset = (('а'..'я') + ('А'..'Я') + ('0'..'9')).join() length = 9
context.FirstName = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) context.MiddleName = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray()) context.LastName = RandomStringUtils.random(length, charset.toCharArray())

con:eventHandlers.name: RequestFilter.filterRequest
TestRunListener.afterStep
